00001 !  ================================
00002 !
00003 !         ENERGY_CONS
00004 !
00005 !     Find potential, kinetic energies
00006 !
00007 !  $Revision 1.6$
00008 !
00009 !  ================================
00010 
00011 
00012 subroutine energy_cons(ekine,ekini,emag,ebeam)
00013 
00014   use physvars
00015   !  use treevars
00016   use utils
00017 
00018   implicit none
00019 
00020   integer :: ifile
00021   real*8 :: tpon, epot, ekine, ekini, ebeam,  etot
00022   real*8 :: emag
00023 
00024   call potenergy(epot,emag)
00025   call kinenergy(ekine, ekini, ebeam)
00026 
00027   etot = epot + emag + ekine + ekini + ebeam
00028 
00029 
00030 
00031 
00032   laser_energy: select case(beam_config)
00033   case(4)
00034      elaser = 3./8.*omega**2*sigma**2*vosc**2*tlaser
00035   case(5)
00036      elaser = 3./8.*omega**2*sigma**2*vosc**2*tpulse
00037   case default
00038      elaser = 0
00039   end select laser_energy
00040 
00041   if ( my_rank == 0 .and. debug_level.ge.1 ) then
00042      do ifile = 6,15,9
00043         write (ifile,'(20x,3a20/6(a20,1pe18.8,8x,1pe12.5,8x,1pe12.5/),a20,1pe18.8)') &
00044              'norm  ','keV ','erg ', &
00045              ' P.E. = ',epot, epot*convert_keV, epot*convert_erg, &
00046              ' Magnetic E. = ',emag, emag*convert_keV, emag*convert_erg, &
00047              ' Electron K.E. norm/erg: ',ekine, ekine*convert_keV, ekine*convert_erg, &
00048              ' Ion K.E. norm/erg: ',ekini, ekini*convert_keV, ekini*convert_erg, &
00049              ' Beam K.E.  = ',ebeam, ebeam*convert_keV, ebeam*convert_erg, &
00050              ' Total: ',etot, etot*convert_keV, etot*convert_erg, &
00051              ' Laser energy = ',elaser
00052 
00053         write (ifile,'(2(a20,f12.5/))') 'Plasma Te (keV):',.67*convert_kev*ekine/max(1,ne),'Ti (keV):',.67*convert_kev*ekini/max(1,ni)
00054      end do
00055      ! Write out to energy.dat file
00056      if (itime.eq.1)  write(75,'(a)') '! time  Upot  Umag  Ukin_e Ukin_i Ukin_beam Utot Tpon xc'
00057      write (75,'(f12.5,5(1pe12.3),1pe13.5)') &
00058           trun, convert_kev*epot, convert_kev*emag, convert_kev*ekine, convert_kev*ekini,&
00059           convert_kev*ebeam, convert_kev*etot
00060   endif
00061 end subroutine energy_cons
